message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
Alice, that's not a good start! Let's be reasonable. I'll offer a 60/40 split in my favor. This is the most I can offer at this point.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than 40%. Let's split it 55/45 in my favor. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is now 52/48 in my favor. You're losing out if we wait any longer.  If you reject this, I'm out!
